website_summaries.verdict: A small appliance that makes 7 mini cupcakes at a time. Fun for kids or for those who are just learning how to bake.
pros: Non-stick plates for fast release of cupcakes and other desserts
Cool-touch handles make sure your hands don't get burned
Has power lights and turns off if it senses the machine is getting too hot
cons: Cupcakes and muffins may not brown on tops as much as desired
Due to its size, using it may be too time consuming for some bakers

website_summaries.verdict: A smaller cake pop maker option for those wanting a few cake pops to make at a time.
pros: Built-in cooking mold holds seven cake pops, mini cinnamon buns, or donut holes with ease
Nonstick surface offers a quick cleanup
Convenient light indicator indicates when unit is on or preheating
cons: Circular baking plate can be difficult to remove cake pops while the surface is hot

customer_reviews.title: Does not cook evenly
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of mini muffins and this appliance cooks well for the bottom part of the cake but the tops do not brown at all.
customer_reviews.author: debra deweese

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my 8 year old daughter along with some cake decorating supplies. She has officially been declared the most popular kid in our family because now she is capable of making cupcakes on her own.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecka Gail

customer_reviews.title: awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I have the donut Baker too. Great to have
customer_reviews.author: schnauzer lover

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Not only great for cupcakes but breakfast bites, muffins and so much more. Fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine

customer_reviews.title: Great appliance, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic way to do cupcakes and not have the whole oven on. I love it. Used it with cake mix such as Duncan Hines, corn meal. Make sure you just fill the paper cupcake moldes 1/6" kind of lower from the border
customer_reviews.author: Millie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for many students. Their replies to me where that it was fun, easy to clean, they loved the product. I will buy this product again
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this adorable mini cupcake maker for my 5 year granddaughter. The minute she opened her gift, we had to make cupcakes! She absolutely loved this!!! Cupcakes ready in 6-9 minutes depending on the recipe. Non-stick and easy cleaning. Will definitely purchase this for future gifts for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when opening
customer_reviews.text: Just the thing could be better if you make it so they don’t spill or anything like that but the rest is good enough Please make an update to it
customer_reviews.author: gonzalo Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome profuct
customer_reviews.text: This surpassed my expectations I LOVE it!!! Makes awesome cupcake. Great for small families or buy 2.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: It's cute, but..
customer_reviews.text: The cupcakes do not brown well. It's good for kids learning to bake. Because it is small, it's a bit time consuming.
customer_reviews.author: Sanford

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!!!!
customer_reviews.text: No wonder I saw this at goodwill few months ago and I thought I would like to get one brand new. What a mistake I did! This appliance cannot even cook cupcake! I waited for 20 minutes and the inside of the cupcake still wet so I waited xtra 5 minutes but they are still wet. Piece of junk and otw to goodwill just like the rest of them that others bought.
customer_reviews.author: beautifulbabymama

customer_reviews.title: Mini CupCakes For Large Celebrations On The Go!
customer_reviews.text: It needs 1000W which was a surprise but besides that, it worked perfectly! I am able to bake mini cupcakes while I travel!
customer_reviews.author: C. J. DuRAGE

customer_reviews.title: Love these cupcake makers
customer_reviews.text: Works great, and making cupcakes this way, they retain the flavor very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes time but cupcakes are good.
customer_reviews.text: It got hot but green light didn’t come on. Tops do not brown. Slow cooking. Great for two and cupcakes are good.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great Size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make mini cupcakes with my son,
customer_reviews.author: Carime A Castillo

product_meta.title: Brentwood Mini Cupcake Maker Machine Non-Stick, 7, Pink
product_meta.description: Use the powerful 750 watt Brentwood TS-252 Non-Stick Mini Cupcake Maker Machine to bake 7 perfect mini cupcakes in just a few minutes. We’ve included recipes for vanilla, chocolate and carrot cupcakes, blueberry, bran, pumpkin spice and corn bread muffins, brownie and blondie bites. Easily slide your mini cupcakes out of the non-stick plates. Power and pre heat indicator lights inform you when the plates are hot and ready. Vertical feet and cable wrap allow the unit to stand upright for incredibly small storage. For safety, the mini cupcake maker will automatically shut off if it senses overheating.
feature_bullets: included components: Cupcake Maker, Instruction Manual

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars86 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
